attr.title: iii
attr.desc: iii is a little 'catroidvania' about a one-eyed cat leaving his comfort zone. Explore underground caverns, gain vision of other dimensions, help the inhabitants, and expand your horizons.
attr.inst: Download the game (free) on itch.io (https://yukonw.itch.io/iii), extract it, and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (free) on [itch.io](https://yukonw.itch.io/iii), extract it, and copy the game files to the port's *gamedata* folder.
